name: CheckboxView
description: A checkbox component with Square (rounded rect) and Circle shapes. Supports checked/unchecked toggle with spring animation, enabled/disabled interactive states, and optional text label. Uses injectable CheckboxColorScheme for brand theming.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Optional label text displayed to the right of the checkbox (8pt gap). Nil or empty hides the label.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Checkbox shape: .square (6pt corner radius rounded rect) or .circle

properties.name: isChecked
properties.description: Whether the checkbox is currently checked (read-only, set via configure or toggleChecked)

properties.name: isEnabled
properties.description: Whether the checkbox is interactable. Disabled state uses lighter border and text colors.

properties.name: checkedIcon
properties.description: Pre-loaded, pre-tinted icon image for the checked state. Pass checkbox-active (square) or check-active-small (circle) from icons-library.

properties.name: colorScheme
properties.description: Injectable color scheme with borderEnabled, borderDisabled, checkedFill, textEnabled, textDisabled colors

properties.name: onTap
properties.description: Callback fired when checkbox is toggled
